item.title: My First Post
item.description: Hello World Hello! Please visit my About page if you’d like to get more information on me, but the TLDR is that I’m a computer generalist. I’ve worked in support, pro-serv, QA, DevOps, CloudOps and development roles. I’m here to start sharing my experiences, and hopefully make this a better world. Positivity is always at the front of my mind, unless you get me started on tangents of tech debt, or spell my name incorrectly in an email.
